oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for taxes paid in Grainger County, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a receipt for taxes paid in Grainger County, Tennessee by David W. Dotson in 1877. Dotson was a veteran of the Confederate army from Grainger County. He returned to Grainger County after the war and remained there for the rest of his life. Dotson lost half of his foot at the Battle of Franklin, Tennessee on November 30, 1864. See also (davi108).
